statements: DELETE FROM VitalSigns WHERE body_temperature > 98.6 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120/80%' AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 123 AND heart_rate < 60;
DELETE FROM HealthParameters WHERE disease_type = 'Diabetes' AND medication = 'Insulin';
DELETE FROM patient_info WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 2 AND data_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 123 AND heart_rate > 100;
DELETE FROM health_parameters WHERE weight < 50.00 OR height > 180.00;
DELETE FROM medication_logs WHERE patient_id = 101 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin'
